extendedIngredients.name: cherry tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pint grape or cherry tomatoes, halved

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
watermelon
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 lb. fresh watermelon, cut into chunks or scooped with a melon baller

recipes.title: Watermelon & Feta Arugula Salad with Honey-Lemon Vinaigrette

winePairing.pairingText: Salad works really well with Chardonnay, Gruener Veltliner, and Sauvignon Blanc. Sauvignon Blanc and Gruner Veltliner both have herby notes that complement salads with enough acid to match tart vinaigrettes, while a Chardonnay can be a good pick for creamy salad dressings. The CalNaturale Chardonnay Lodi with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 11 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: CalNaturale Chardonnay Lodi
productMatches.description: Complexity and intensity define this Chardonnay. The nose is full of citrus, green apple and pear with floral overtones. The flavors are rich on entry with lively fruit in the mid palate and a long fruity, warm finish.

recipes.instructions: Combine all of the salad ingredients together, toss and place on serving plates.In a small bowl or container with a spout, whisk ingredients for vinaigrette. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Drizzle over salad plates and serve.Enjoy!

steps.step: Combine all of the salad ingredients together, toss and place on serving plates.In a small bowl or container with a spout, whisk ingredients for vinaigrette. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.
Drizzle over salad plates and serve.Enjoy!
